alert.note: Alert for Canovanas; Carolina; Loiza; Rio Grande; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 03 at 4:39AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Canovanas, Carolina, Loiza, Rio Grande, San Juan and Trujillo Alto. * WHEN...Until 645 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 339 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Canovanas, Carolina, Trujillo Alto, Loiza, Rio Grande, Guaynabo, Vieques, Santa Barbara, Campo Rico, San Isidro, La Dolores, Hato Candal, Bartolo, Lomas, Benitez and Palmer. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Canovanas; Carolina; Loiza; Rio Grande; San Juan; Trujillo Alto
